title: Lobby bug + camp reset bug
body: Had a bug in the lobby where me and another player could not swap champions, we tried for the entire time and even reset it but it was like they were locked out of hitting accept. In the same game the other teams red buff was sitting there (was not cc'd or anything) with 550ish health, it's health did not reset. This swap bug ruined the game completely because one of us was jungle and we both couldn't do anything that game basically.
